m_szDocTitle: Overtaking Ford : Hyundai-Kia Motors Ranks 4th in Eco-friendly Vehicle Sales in Global Market | BusinessKorea
m_szDocSumamry: 20 January 2016 - 11:45am Marie Kim Hyundai Motor Co. and its smaller affiliate Kia Motors Corp. ranked fourth in the world in sales of environmentally friendly vehicles for 2015. With releasing diverse new products this year, including the its first eco-friendly vehicle Ioniq, the company is expected to round out the top three in the global market.
